entry.title: Buck I'm a cheerleader
entry.summary:
Author: Grocerystoredivorce

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,537Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: “It’s uh—,” Eddie grits his teeth and hopes it looks like a smile, “tight.” Buck’s face falls a fraction, “like, in a bad way?” And no, that is not what Eddie meant, but it was the only thing that came to mind that he could even comprehend saying out loud. I love it Buck, I want to bury my face in your fat fucking tits and suffocate. So yeah, it’s tight, is all that he can come up with. “No, no, not at all,” Eddie bursts out when he realises that he probably needs to say something else. “It’s—, uh, you look great.” - Buck dresses up in a slutty halloween costume, horniness & feelings ensue

entry.title: Off the Record
entry.summary:
Author: ScribblesAfterDark

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,133Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 45

Summary: As the guys started heading back onto the field, Eddie lagged behind. Part of him wanted to head back out. Throw a few more. Work on his accuracy. But, Coach had said to ice his shoulder, and he followed rules to the letter…at least on the field. When he rounded the corner toward the small athletic training room, the cool air from inside hit him like a wave…and there he was. Evan Buckley, officially part of the athletic training staff, unofficially Eddie Diaz’s favorite member of the training staff. Buck was a Sophomore, one of the student trainers assigned to baseball. He’d said something once about studying sports medicine, wanting to work with pro athletes someday. He didn’t act intimidated by the players like some of the other trainers did…didn’t treat Eddie like some kind of celebrity. It was…refreshing. Eddie hadn’t meant to notice him every time he came in…honestly, he tried not to…but something about the way Buck moved, calm and confident, made it hard to look away. Or, Eddie Díaz has the perfect life laid out for him: star pitcher, bright future, endless expectations. Off the field, though, it starts to crack when he’s drawn to Buck…the one person who refuses to play along.

entry.title: Death called to the wolf
entry.summary:
Author: shadowkatninjawarrior

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 166,113Chapters: 72/?Kudos: 1,403

Summary: Evan Buckley was intimately familiar with death. It hung in the air around him, lived under his skin.It was the reason he'd been born in the first place.Maybe it had seemed like some awful cosmic joke to his parents when they'd found out the source of his magic. It could have been anything.It just had to be death.Eddie Diaz doesn't know how to be a werewolf.Which is unfortunate, given he's been one all his life. He brought his son to LA to get away from it all, but he couldn't run from what he was.Or:Death Mage Buck and Werewolf Eddie find one another at the 118.

entry.title: stay alive, open wide
entry.summary:
Author: dogfishmonger

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 361,626Chapters: 35/40Kudos: 904

Summary: He feels like shit when he's hungry, and he plays better when he's empty. The cold air doesn't touch him as much. The floodlights turn silvery-soft.And he likes eating. Keeps his hands busy, mouth busy, mind busy. Something to chew through, putty in the ears.Go until he can't anymore. Cycle it back out. Be ready. --OR: Buck's had on-again, off-again bulimia since he was 14.--Updates on Wednesdays. Title from Psychic Friend's "We Do Not Belong".

entry.title: Polar Opposites
entry.summary:
Author: inkinmyheartandonthepage

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,070Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 79

Summary: “Buck.” Buck jolted out of sleep, groaning as he was ripped from a dream he can’t remember. “Buck.” Prying opened his eyes, Buck squinted in the bright glow that was hovering over his bunk. He had planned on catching a few hours of sleep on the forty-eight hours shift he was currently thirty-six hours into before the bell could ring again. The resident ghost of fire station 118 had other plans.

entry.title: The Rules We Break
entry.summary:
Author: buddiesongfic

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,056Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: Buck threw a half-hearted punch that Eddie blocked easily; Eddie countered, pinning Buck’s arm above his head. Their faces were inches apart—close enough that Buck could feel Eddie’s breath against his skin, smell the faint scent of gun oil and cologne. “Admit it,” Eddie said softly, his voice low and teasing. “You missed me.” Buck’s lips quirked. “You’d like that, wouldn’t you?” “Yeah,” Eddie murmured, eyes flicking down. “I would.” Before Buck could come up with something smart to say, Eddie leaned down and kissed him—quick, hot, and dizzying. It was gone before Buck could even process it, leaving him stunned and breathless. “What was that?” Buck managed. Eddie grinned. “Distraction.” He shoved Buck off, rolling to his feet and circling him like a predator. Buck laughed, standing and brushing off his jacket. “Oh, you’re in for it now.” OR; Both Eddie and Buck are mafias, and sons of the most well known mafia corporations. One thing, their fathers were rivals, but Buck and Eddie are secretly in love with each other, and have been going on secret dates behind their backs. This is a little snippet, like a slice of life for them. (IM BAD AT SUMMARIZING TS AAAGH)

entry.title: come on home (you don't have to be alone)
entry.summary:
Author: buckseddiediaz

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,672Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 97

Summary: “Buck…” Eddie tried, but even he could hear how that would not be enough.Buck pushed past him and headed straight for the door. “Buck!” Eddie tried again, but to no avail.“I’m going to head to the station. I’ll see you there. Say hi to Chris for me. Or would that be overstepping too?” Buck’s words bit into Eddie’s skin like a chemical. Before he could say anything, before he could tell Buck that he wasn’t overstepping—that he couldn’t ever overstep, the door was shut in his face.Breakfast was easy, at least Chris pretended not to notice how red-rimmed Eddie’s eyes were.Or; Buck and Eddie's first fight as a couple, except they do not actually let each other finish talking which makes things bigger than necessary

entry.title: The Family We Chose
entry.summary:
Author: buddiecanon118

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 90,155Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 461

Summary: “Hi, I’m Eddie Diaz, Jee-Yun’s Uncle.” “Mr. Diaz, lovely to put a face to the name.” She shakes his hand quickly. “ She talks about you and your husband all the time, and so does Buck whenever he helps out.” And Eddie should correct her. He really should. He and Buck are decidedly not married, they’re not even dating. Sure, Eddie’s though about it, of course he has. They’ve been best friends for years, his son loves him, and they’ve been sleeping in the same bed since he and Christopher got back from El Paso. But Eddie’s straight, and Buck isn’t into him like that. He’s going to correct her. Definitely. He’s going to look at her and say– “Yep, that’s me.” Oh. That’s not… Or: Eddie chaperones Jee-Yun's school field trip, Buck gets jealous, and things spiral from there

entry.title: hate me, love me, as long as you think about me
entry.summary:
Author: goforeddie

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,264Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 46

Summary: “What do you have to say after winning tonight? Are the Kings set to a good start of the season?” one of the journalist, Ethan if Eddie recognized his voice correctly, asked. That fucking 9 million a year contract smile was the first thing Eddie saw. The second was the shine in those baby blues people call his eyes. “Oh, I don’t know…” Evan Buckley said with faux modesty, “I think we’re off to destroy the Stars for the rest of the year, if they play like they did tonight.” A few chuckles, some flash from the camera and then another question, the same that always comes nowadays, “What about Diaz? Do you think he’ll save that team?” Buckley rolled his eyes at the question, then looked directly in the camera and said, “I doubt Diaz could save a sinking ship, even if he was made captain,” and then the TV was turned off. OR : a heated rivalry AU, where the two biggest star of the NHL - who happens to be rivals since their rookie year - eventually get into a sort of... enemies with benefits, then friends, then lovers... or maybe they were always lovers.

entry.title: Unconditional Love
entry.summary:
Author: villayuly1987

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,664Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 13

Summary: Evan is Bobby’s biological son from a previous marriage; Athena is his stepmother)This story is set six months after a major virus exposure. Eddie has returned home from Texas to help out Chimney, who is temporarily stepping in as captain of the 118 firehouse while the actual captain, Bobby, is in a medically induced coma fighting the virus.During the six months apart, Eddie and Evan grew incredibly close, leading to a secret relationship between them. Evan is struggling significantly with his father's condition, spending almost all his time at the hospital, barely sleeping or eating. Eddie is actively trying to take care of him, even having to drag Evan out of the hospital to rest.

entry.title: The Way Forward
entry.summary:
Author: Beaner61517

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,803Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 286

Summary: Bobby died and Eddie left. Bobby died and Eddie left. It was like those words repeated in his mind over and over. Nothing was the same any longer. The thought of working at the 118 made Buck feel like his chest was caving in and he couldn’t breathe. Sure Hen, Ravi and Chim were there but the feeling of home was gone. Buck didn’t even know if he wanted to be a fire fighter anymore. He didn’t feel the joy or purpose any longer. The fire had burned out, no pun intended.OrWhat if Bobby really did die and Eddie did leave to go back to El Paso? What does Buck do when everyone leaves??? He packs up and runs away only to come back 3 years later. A changed man with a daughter. Will he and Eddie be able to figure their shit out and finally get their happy ending? Of course they will because this is my story and only HEA's are allowed. Though the first chapter is pretty sad so you are warned.
